column7: $! (ruleUid := f'pli-tv-{uid[0:2]}-vb-{uid[2:4]}') and ExistsOnSC(ruleUid,n[0:1]) and f'https://suttacentral.net/{ruleUid}{n0}/en/brahmali?reference=main{"#" + DotRef(n[1:],3) if len(n) > 1 else ""}' !$
$! ExistsOnSC("pli-tv-kd",n[0:1]) and f'https://suttacentral.net/pli-tv-kd{n0}/en/brahmali?reference=main{"#" + DotRef(n[1:],3) if len(n) > 1 else ""}' !$
$! ExistsOnSC(f'pli-tv-{uid}',n[0:1]) and f'https://suttacentral.net/pli-tv-{uid}{n0}/en/brahmali?reference=main{"#" + DotRef(n[1:],3) if len(n) > 1 else ""}' !$
